name: Slow Mo Samurai
description:
Slow Mo Samurai

Entry for Ludum Dare 51
Theme: Every 10 Seconds

Beat all 15 levels, each within 10 seconds

Download game for optimal experience and cool slow motion audio!

A great evil encroaches on your village.

Use your unparalleled skill and speed to fight it.

Vanquish the bandits to keep your people safe.

Note: This game doesn't save yet so be careful going back to the main menu. Sorry!

How To Play:

Hold Left Click to charge dash attach and slow down time

Aim with mouse

Release Left Click to dash attack

Watch bar at the bottom to control how far you dash

Kill all enemies in 10 minutes to win

Fonts by Chevy Ray https://chevyray.itch.io/pixel-fonts
